attributes.action: Rename Kensington Palace Gardens (the street, in W8) as “Alexei Navalny Street”
attributes.background: Kensington Palace Gardens is the street where the Russian Embassy is sited. The world needs to send a message to Putin and giving their embassy an address named after the imprisoned leader of his opposition is one (small) way to do it.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local road names are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.
